participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and dedicated, loves engaging with others about sports and technology.
participant_1.background: i have a children and a dogs. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: reflective and somewhat cynical, struggling with personal challenges but seeking connection.
participant_2.background: i'm overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working.

content.text: Hey! Do you enjoy American sports?
